00043     class _OgreExport ParticleSystemRenderer : public StringInterface
00044     {
00045     public:
00047         ParticleSystemRenderer() {}
00049         virtual ~ParticleSystemRenderer() {}
00050 
00052         virtual const String& getType(void) const = 0;
00053 
00059         virtual void _updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue, 
00060             std::list<Particle*>& currentParticles, bool cullIndividually) = 0;
00061 
00063         virtual void _setMaterial(MaterialPtr& mat) = 0;
00065         virtual void _notifyCurrentCamera(Camera* cam) = 0;
00067         virtual void _notifyAttached(Node* parent, bool isTagPoint = false) = 0;
00069         virtual void _notifyParticleRotated(void) {}
00071         virtual void _notifyParticleResized(void) {}
00073         virtual void _notifyParticleQuota(size_t quota) = 0;
00075         virtual void _notifyDefaultDimensions(Real width, Real height) = 0;
00077         virtual void _notifyParticleEmitted(Particle* particle) {}
00079         virtual void _notifyParticleExpired(Particle* particle) {}
00081         virtual void _notifyParticleMoved(std::list<Particle*>& currentParticles) {}
00083         virtual void _notifyParticleCleared(std::list<Particle*>& currentParticles) {}
00091         virtual ParticleVisualData* _createVisualData(void) { return 0; }
00099         virtual void _destroyVisualData(ParticleVisualData* vis) { assert (vis == 0); }
00100 
00104         virtual void setRenderQueueGroup(uint8 queueID) = 0;
00105 
00108         virtual void setKeepParticlesInLocalSpace(bool keepLocal) = 0;
00109 
00111         virtual SortMode _getSortMode(void) const = 0;
00112 
00113     };
